description: Registers an endpoint under an Amazon Chime AppInstanceUser. The endpoint receives messages for a user. For push notifications, the endpoint is a mobile device used to receive mobile push notifications for a user.

parameters.name: Type
parameters.description: The type of the AppInstanceUserEndpoint. Supported types: APNS: The mobile notification service for an Apple device. APNS_SANDBOX: The sandbox environment of the mobile notification service for an Apple device. GCM: The mobile notification service for an Android device. Populate the ResourceArn value of each type as PinpointAppArn.

parameters.name: ResourceArn
parameters.description: The ARN of the resource to which the endpoint belongs.

parameters.name: EndpointAttributes
parameters.description: The attributes of an Endpoint. The device token for the GCM, APNS, and APNS_SANDBOX endpoint types. VoipDeviceToken (string) --- The VOIP device token for the APNS and APNS_SANDBOX endpoint types.

nested_params.name: DeviceToken
nested_params.description: The device token for the GCM, APNS, and APNS_SANDBOX endpoint types.

nested_params.name: VoipDeviceToken
nested_params.description: The VOIP device token for the APNS and APNS_SANDBOX endpoint types.

parameters.name: ClientRequestToken
parameters.description: The unique ID assigned to the request. Use different tokens to register other endpoints. This field is autopopulated if not provided.

nested_items.name: EndpointId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier of the AppInstanceUserEndpoint.
